alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 06 at 5:27PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 232, AND 233... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228, 232 and 233. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo
